about_the_game:
Give your detective games and puzzle-solving subplots some fitting tunes with the Mystery RPG Music Pack! Ayato sound create has created another BGM pack with 10 new songs to keep your players focused on finding the truth and noticing the little details. Explore empty crime scenes, remember important clues while talking to friends, get your pulse pounding when fighting thugs, and more with these tracks! 3 event tracks, 3 battle tracks, and 4 field tracks are ready to turn any modern map into a location teeming with possible dangers and secrets.

Each track comes in M4a and looping Ogg file formats so you can easily add them to your MV/MZ projects, or use them in your favorite engine! If you’ve been looking for some dark tunes to fit your game’s story or just need to add a bit of danger to a spooky area, check out the Mystery RPG Music Pack!

Contents:

* 10 royalty free songs
* ogg and m4a file formats included

Tracklist:

01_event_memory
02_event_rewind
03_event_sad song
04_battle_emergency
05_battle_scared
06_battle_fate
07_field_walk
08_field_gallery
09_field_abyss
10_field_womb
